welcome_message_body: Welcome to Masindi, Uganda! Known for its lush greenery, friendly locals, and proximity to Murchison Falls National Park, we invite you to explore and soak in the natural beauty and warm hospitality of our charming city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Travellers' Corner
restaurants.description: Travellers' Corner is a restaurant located in the city.

terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.
